activities:
Kliger-Weiss Infosystems provides Enterprise Cloud Platform systems supporting specialty retailer operations. The client will capture purchase-related and inventory transactions on their point of sale terminals (PC and Mobile) and will then transmit this data to the Company's servers in the United States.  We do not transmit credit card information, nor any governmental identification.

It is important to note that we do NOT have any public-facing website in providing the above services.  Only our clients can log into their respective systems on the Company's servers in the Company's secured data centers.
personaldata: Client's Customer name, address, email, birthdate, sales-related transaction information,   Kliger-Weiss Infosystems does not receive or maintain credit card information.
privacyprograms: The Company engages an international accounting firm to perform an annual SSAE16 Type 2 Review.  The Company has obtained its ROC for PCI Service Organization compliance.
